decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	The proportioning and spacing of the proposed terrace houses would result in a development that would be cramped in appearance and uncharacteristic of the pattern of development on this estate.  The proposal would for this reason be contrary to policies ENV.1.1, H1.1, H.1.2 and H.3.3 of the Unitary Development Plan and Policies ENV-B.1.1, H.1.1, H.4.1 and H.6.3 of the UDP Proposed Alterations Revised Deposit.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development would result in the loss of open space in the vicinity, no exceptional circumstances have been demonstrated to justify its loss, the proposal would be detrimental to the amenity of the local area and contrary to policies ENV 4.1 Protection of Open Space of the Unitary Development Plan and ENV-N.1.13 Protection of Open Space of the UDP Proposed Alterations Revised Deposit.
description: Erection of 3 no x three bedroomed dwellinghouses with associated parking and landscaping.
